settings.subtitle: ForSURE offers tailored EPR software for modern retailers, simplifying compliance with user-centric design for efficient EPR processes.

settings.video_alt_text: EPR explained by ForSURE in a video
settings.subtitle: In the rapidly evolving retail environment, ForSURE stands as your reliable partner, simplifying the intricate compliance landscape. Our software is engineered for modern retailers, e-commerce, importers, and manufacturers, with a special focus on SMEs. Through a seamless blend of advanced technology and user-centric design, ForSURE transforms the daunting task of Extended Producer Responsibility (WEEE, Batteries, Packaging (SUP) and Textile) reporting into a streamlined, click-efficient process.

settings.text: Bid farewell to the hours-long data aggregation and analysis. With ForSURE, achieve precise, compliant, and insightful EPR reports within minutes, not hours. Our software is tailored to adapt to the regulatory frameworks of various countries, making compliance a less tedious, more rewarding endeavor.

settings.heading: Your Strategic Advantage in Sustainable Retail

settings.text: In an era where sustainability is not just a choice, but a business imperative, ForSURE empowers you to uphold and showcase your commitment to eco-conscious operations. Our platform is not just about meeting the regulatory benchmarks; it's about exceeding them and setting new standards in responsible retailing.

settings.text2: Our beta testing phase has revealed the extraordinary capabilities of ForSURE in streamlining compliance and sustainability processes for SMEs. Ecommerce Europe highlights a daunting challenge: completing 300 EPR reports across the EU typically requires around 39 days, assuming an optimistic estimate of 1 hour per report. ForSURE, however, has been designed to revolutionize this process. By enabling each report to be completed in approximately 10 minutes, we have dramatically reduced the total reporting time to just 6 days. This isn’t just a software solution; it’s a leap forward in how SMEs approach and manage their compliance obligations efficiently.

settings.text: ForSURE collaborates with ZeroBees to leverage their CO2 calculation and sustainability consulting, enriching EPR strategies with vital environmental insights.
Zignify provides end-to-end supply chain support, from sourcing to optimization, and now extends to EPR assistance via our partnership.

Our collaboration with Duty Refunds boosts ForSURE's offerings with elite tax recovery services, propelling global market efficiency. This partnership magnifies our clients' cost-saving opportunities.
ForSURE draws on HU's innovative thinking and human-centered approach to master problem-solving across different business sectors.
With UtrechtInc's strategic insights, ForSURE is crafting accessible data management solutions that embody the future of tech innovation.

With PLNT's guidance, we are effectively navigating our go-to-market phase and refining our tech solutions. Their support ensures sustained impact and innovation in the industry beyond this initial stage.

settings.title: Rooted in Innovation, Nurtured by Partnership
settings.text: Our journey began with a vision to blend technological innovation with collaborative synergy. As we've grown, so has our network of partnerships. Each new collaboration has been a step forward, enhancing our software's capabilities and enriching our ecosystem. This growth isn’t just a testament to our software’s prowess; it's a reflection of our commitment to foster a nurturing environment for industry leaders of tomorrow.

settings.title: Engage with ForSURE
settings.text: Delve deeper into the features of ForSURE, book a personalized demo, or explore our resourceful EPR education page to understand better the landscape of Extended Producer Responsibility. Your journey towards effortless compliance and sustainable retailing begins here.

settings.title: What is ForSURE?
settings.text: ForSURE is a comprehensive software solution designed to help retailers, particularly small and medium enterprises (SMEs), manage their Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) compliance efficiently. It automates the complexities of EPR, making compliance straightforward and stress-free.

settings.title: How does ForSURE help with EPR reporting?
settings.text: ForSURE automates the entire EPR reporting process, from data collection to report submission. It drastically reduces the time spent on compliance, enabling businesses to generate accurate reports in minutes. For more details, you can read our EPR software page.

settings.title: Who can benefit from using ForSURE?
settings.text: ForSURE is ideal for retailers, e-commerce businesses, importers, and manufacturers who need to comply with EPR regulations. It’s especially beneficial for SMEs looking for a streamlined solution to manage their EPR obligations without dedicating excessive resources.

settings.title: What EPR areas does ForSURE cover?
settings.text: ForSURE covers a wide range of EPR obligations, including Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment (WEEE), batteries, packaging (SUP), and textiles. The software ensures compliance with multiple regulatory frameworks across different regions, making it a versatile tool for businesses.

settings.title: How can I get started with ForSURE?
settings.text: Getting started with ForSURE is simple. You can explore the software's features directly on the website or schedule a demo to see how it can meet your specific EPR compliance needs. The platform is designed to be user-friendly, making it easy to begin managing your EPR obligations efficiently. If you are eligible sign up for a free plan!
